text: Odontoptera is a genus of insects in the family Fulgoridae: from Central and South America.Hemiptera Databases: Fulgoromorpha Lists On the Web (FLOW): Odontoptera (retrieved 14/11/2017) ==Species== The following species are listed:NCBI Taxonomy browser: Fulgoridae (retrieved 14 November 2017) * Odontoptera carrenoi (Signoret, 1849) * Odontoptera spectabilis (Carreno, 1841), (type species) * Odontoptera toulgoeti (Bourgoin & O'Brien, 1994) ==Gallery== Odontoptera carrenoi MHNTvol.jpg|O. carrenoi (Toulouse Museum) Odontoptera spectabilis, paraguay 2016-02-23-19.49.jpg|O. spectabilis, Paraguay ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:Fulgorinae
title: Odontoptera
